scripts.start-dev: NODE_ENV=dev nodemon -r dotenv/config -L --watch dist dist/server.js dotenv_config_path=.env-local
scripts.start-prod: NODE_ENV=dev nodemon -r dotenv/config -L --watch dist dist/server.js dotenv_config_path=.env
scripts.start-dev-report: NODE_ENV=dev nodemon -r dotenv/config -L --watch dist dist/report.js dotenv_config_path=.env-local
scripts.start-prod-report: NODE_ENV=dev nodemon -r dotenv/config -L --watch dist dist/report.js dotenv_config_path=.env
